summary: This script is a bash file that executes python3 script "shrink.py" on judger.log, replacing original judger.log with the shrunken version.

details.comment: This script is a bash file that executes python3 script "shrink.py" on judger.log, replacing original judger.log with the shrunken version.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
# fuck! store it later.
# will you store working script somewhere?
cat judger.log | python3 shrink.py > judger_shrink.log
mv judger_shrink.log judger.log
